item.title: What Lies Below
item.author: Author
item.description: Introduction What Lies Below was a project I worked on for a game development class. It is written entirely in C# and is created with the help of the Unity3D game engine. This project strictly followed SOLID design principles to ensure clean code that was easy to maintain and extend as the project grew. This project grew rapidly as I added new features to the game over about two months. In total I created over 50 C# classes to support a wide range of game systems.

item.title: New Website Powered By Hugo
item.author: Author
item.description: Introduction Originally I had a very simple setup for my personal website. It is a very basic Bootstrap jumbotron with a link to my Github page. This was only ever meant to be a palceholder until I had the time to create a real website. My website has looked like the image above since May of 2019. Nearly two years later I have realized it is time for a serious upgrade.
